hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql:
insert into "products" ("body_html", "created_at", "handle", "id", "image", "images", "options", "product_type", "published_at", "published_scope", "tags", "template_suffix", "title", "metafields_global_title_tag", "metafields_global_description_tag", "updated_at", "variants", "vendor") values ('
  • 9 Philips PD9012M/37 Widescreen Portable DVD Player
  • Grade B (see below for description)
  • General Features:
  • Black color
  • Region 1
  • Portable 9-inch DVD player with additional 9-inch screen
  • TFT color widescreen LCD display
  • Plays DVD, DVD±R, DVD±RW, (S)VCD, MP3-CD, CD, CD-R and CD-RW files
  • View JPEG images from a picture disc
  • Built-in stereo speakers
  • Headphone jack for personal enjoyment
  • Full Resume on Power Loss
  • Single cable connection for quick installation in the car
  • Includes car adapter, wall adapter and mounting straps
  • Picture/Display Features:
  • Display screen type: LCD TFT
  • Diagonal screen size (inch): 9 inch
  • Resolution: 640(w) x 220(H) x 3(RGB)
  • Video Playback:
  • Playback Media: DVD, Picture CD, SVCD, Video CD, DVD-R/-RW, MP3-CD, CD-R/CD-RW, DVD+R/+RW, CD 
  • Disc Playback Modes: Disc Menu, Fast Backward, Fast Forward, OSD, Repeat, Shuffle Play, Zoom, Resume Playback from Stop 
  • Video disc playback system: NTSC, PAL
  • Sound:
  • Output Power: 250mW RMS (built-in speakers) 
  • Output power (RMS): 10mW RMS (earphone) 
  • Signal to noise ratio:  >80dB (earphone), >62dB (built-in speakers)
  • Audio Playback:
  • Compression format: Dolby Digital, MP3
  • MP3 bit rates: 32 - 320 kbps
  • Playback Media: CD, CD-RW, MP3-CD, CD-R 
  • File systems supported: ISO-9660, Jolliet
  • Connectivity:
  • DC in: 9 - 12V
  • Headphone jack: 3.5 mm Stereo Headphone
  • AV output: Composite (CVBS) 
  • Unit Dimensions:
  • Main Unit: 7.15 x 9.5 x 1.5-inches (H x W x D, approximate)
  • Additional LCD: 7.15 x 9.43 x 0.85-inches (H x W x D, approximate)
  • Regulatory Approvals:
  • FCC
  • CE
  • BSMI
  • WEEE
  • C-Tick
  • GOST-R
  • NOM NYCE
  • cULus Listed
  • Portable 9-inch DVD player
  • Additional 9-inch screen
  • AV cable
  • Mounting car straps
  • Car power adapter
  • Wall power adapter (Input: 100-240V, 50/60Hz, Output: 9V, 800mA)
  • User Manual

Condition : This item is Class B refurbished. This item may have minor scratches, and or minor blemishes. This item has been fully factory tested to insure its ability to function properly.
